org.sql: SELECT organizations.* FROM organizations INNER JOIN organization_memberships ON organizations.id = organization_memberships.organization_id WHERE organization_memberships.user_id = "$1" ORDER BY organizations.name ASC

rewrites.sql: SELECT organizations.* FROM organizations INNER JOIN organization_memberships ON organizations.id = organization_memberships.organization_id WHERE organization_memberships.user_id = "$1" ORDER BY organizations.name ASC LIMIT 1
